name: PropertyListSerialization.MutabilityOptions
desc: These constants specify mutability options in property lists.

items.name: static var mutableContainers: PropertyListSerialization.MutabilityOptions
items.desc: Causes the returned property list to have mutable containers but immutable leaves.

items.name: static var mutableContainersAndLeaves: PropertyListSerialization.MutabilityOptions
items.desc: Causes the returned property list to have mutable containers and leaves.
